df-ida
blocks.content: Definition of the identity arrow, which is just the identity morphism tagged with its domain and codomain. (Contributed by FL, 26-Oct-2007.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 11-Jan-2017.)

blocks.name: df-coa
blocks.content: Definition of the composition of arrows. Since arrows are tagged with domain and codomain, this does not need to be a quinary operation like the regular composition in a category ` comp ` . Instead, it is a partial binary operation on arrows, which is defined when the domain of the first arrow matches the codomain of the second. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 11-Jan-2017.)
blocks.origin:
axiom df-coa(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3) {
  |- wceq(ccoa, cmpt(s0, ccat, cmpo(s1, s2, cfv(carw, cv(s0)), crab(s3, cfv(carw, cv(s0)), wceq(cfv(ccoda, cv(s3)), cfv(cdoma, cv(s1)))), cotp(cfv(cdoma, cv(s2)), cfv(ccoda, cv(s1)), co(cfv(c2nd, cv(s1)), co(cop(cfv(cdoma, cv(s2)), cfv(cdoma, cv(s1))), cfv(cco, cv(s0)), cfv(ccoda, cv(s1))), cfv(c2nd, cv(s2)))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
}
blocks.pretty:
axiom df-coa(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3) {
  ‚ä¢ compA =(s0 ‚àà Cat ‚Ü¶(s1 ‚àà(Arrow ` s0), s2 ‚àà { s3 ‚àà(Arrow ` s0)|(codA ` s3)=(domA ` s1)} ‚Ü¶ <(domA ` s2),(codA ` s1),((2nd ` s1)[(<(domA ` s2),(domA ` s1)>[(comp ` s0)](codA ` s1))](2nd ` s2))>))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s3)
}

blocks.name: idafval
blocks.content: Value of the identity arrow function. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 11-Jan-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm idafval(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(c0, cmpt(s0, c1, cotp(cv(s0), cv(s0), cfv(c2, cv(s0))))))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(cida, c3))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, ccat))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(ccid, c3))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(w0, wceq(c0, cmpt(s0, c1, cotp(cv(s0), cv(s0), cfv(c2, cv(s0)))))), diffsc(s0, c0))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wceq(c0, cmpt(s0, c1, cotp(cv(s0), cv(s0), cfv(c2, cv(s0)))))), diffsc(s0, c2))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wceq(c0, cmpt(s0, c1, cotp(cv(s0), cv(s0), cfv(c2, cv(s0)))))), diffsw(s0, w0))
  syl5eq(c0, cmpt(s0, c1, cotp(cv(s0), cv(s0), cfv(c2, cv(s0)))), cfv(cida, c3), w0)
  syl(w0, wceq(cfv(cida, c3), cmpt(s0, c1, cotp(cv(s0), cv(s0), cfv(c2, cv(s0))))), wcel(c3, ccat))
  mptfvmpt(s0, hs0, c3, ccat, cida, c1, cotp(cv(s0), cv(s0), cfv(c2, cv(s0))), cmpt(s0, cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), cotp(cv(s0), cv(s0), cfv(cfv(ccid, cv(hs0)), cv(s0)))), cbs, c3)
  mpteq12dv(s0, cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), cotp(cv(s0), cv(s0), cfv(cfv(ccid, cv(hs0)), cv(s0))), c1, cotp(cv(s0), cv(s0), cfv(c2, cv(s0))), wceq(cv(hs0), c3))
  syl6eqr(cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), c1, cfv(cbs, c3), wceq(cv(hs0), c3))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c3, cbs)
  oteq3d(cv(s0), cv(s0), cfv(cfv(ccid, cv(hs0)), cv(s0)), cfv(c2, cv(s0)), wceq(cv(hs0), c3))
  fveq1d(cfv(ccid, cv(hs0)), cv(s0), c2, wceq(cv(hs0), c3))
  syl6eqr(cfv(ccid, cv(hs0)), c2, cfv(ccid, c3), wceq(cv(hs0), c3))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c3, ccid)
  df-ida(hs0, s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(ccat)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(cotp(cv(s0), cv(s0), cfv(c2, cv(s0))))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c3)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm idafval(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí c0 =(s0 ‚àà c1 ‚Ü¶ < s0, s0,(c2 ` s0)>))
  ‚ä£ c0 =(IdA ` c3)
  ‚ä£ c1 =(Base ` c3)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c3 ‚àà Cat)
  ‚ä£ c2 =(Id ` c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, w0)
} = {
  a1ii((w0 ‚Üí c0 =(s0 ‚àà c1 ‚Ü¶ < s0, s0,(c2 ` s0)>)), d(s0, c0))
  a1ii((w0 ‚Üí c0 =(s0 ‚àà c1 ‚Ü¶ < s0, s0,(c2 ` s0)>)), d(s0, c2))
  a1ii((w0 ‚Üí c0 =(s0 ‚àà c1 ‚Ü¶ < s0, s0,(c2 ` s0)>)), d(s0, w0))
  syl5eq(c0, (s0 ‚àà c1 ‚Ü¶ < s0, s0,(c2 ` s0)>), (IdA ` c3), w0)
  syl(w0, (IdA ` c3)=(s0 ‚àà c1 ‚Ü¶ < s0, s0,(c2 ` s0)>), c3 ‚àà Cat)
  mptfvmpt(s0, hs0, c3, ccat, cida, c1, < s0, s0,(c2 ` s0)>, (s0 ‚àà(Base ` hs0)‚Ü¶ < s0, s0,((Id ` hs0)` s0)>), cbs, c3)
  mpteq12dv(s0, (Base ` hs0), < s0, s0,((Id ` hs0)` s0)>, c1, < s0, s0,(c2 ` s0)>, hs0 = c3)
  syl6eqr((Base ` hs0), c1, (Base ` c3), hs0 = c3)
  fveq2(hs0, c3, cbs)
  oteq3d(s0, s0, ((Id ` hs0)` s0), (c2 ` s0), hs0 = c3)
  fveq1d((Id ` hs0), s0, c2, hs0 = c3)
  syl6eqr((Id ` hs0), c2, (Id ` c3), hs0 = c3)
  fveq2(hs0, c3, ccid)
  df-ida(hs0, s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(ccat)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(< s0, s0,(c2 ` s0)>)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs0, c3)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: idaval
blocks.content: Value of the identity arrow function. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 11-Jan-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm idaval(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(c0, c1), cotp(c1, c1, cfv(c2, c1))))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(cida, c3))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cbs, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, ccat))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(ccid, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c4))
} = {
  fvmptd(hs0, c0, c1, cotp(c1, c1, cfv(c2, c1)), c4, cotp(cv(hs0), cv(hs0), cfv(c2, cv(hs0))), universe, w0)
  idafval(hs0, c0, c4, c2, c3, w0)
  oteq123d(cv(hs0), cv(hs0), cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), c1, c1, cfv(c2, c1), wa(w0, wceq(cv(hs0), c1)))
  fveq2d(c2, cv(hs0), c1, wa(w0, wceq(cv(hs0), c1)))
  simpr(w0, wceq(cv(hs0), c1))
  a1i(w0, wcel(cotp(c1, c1, cfv(c2, c1)), universe))
  otex(c1, c1, cfv(c2, c1))
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(cotp(c1, c1, cfv(c2, c1)))
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm idaval(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí(c0 ` c1)= < c1, c1,(c2 ` c1)>)
  ‚ä£ c0 =(IdA ` c3)
  ‚ä£ c4 =(Base ` c3)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c3 ‚àà Cat)
  ‚ä£ c2 =(Id ` c3)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c1 ‚àà c4)
} = {
  fvmptd(hs0, c0, c1, < c1, c1,(c2 ` c1)>, c4, < hs0, hs0,(c2 ` hs0)>, universe, w0)
  idafval(hs0, c0, c4, c2, c3, w0)
  oteq123d(hs0, hs0, (c2 ` hs0), c1, c1, (c2 ` c1), (w0 ‚àß hs0 = c1))
  fveq2d(c2, hs0, c1, (w0 ‚àß hs0 = c1))
  simpr(w0, hs0 = c1)
  a1i(w0, < c1, c1,(c2 ` c1)> ‚àà ùïå)
  otex(c1, c1, (c2 ` c1))
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(< c1, c1,(c2 ` c1)>)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
}

blocks.name: ida2
blocks.content: Morphism part of the identity arrow. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 11-Jan-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm ida2(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(c2nd, cfv(c0, c1)), cfv(c2, c1)))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(cida, c3))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cbs, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, ccat))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(ccid, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c4))
} = {
  syl6eq(cfv(c2nd, cfv(c0, c1)), cfv(c2, c1), cfv(c2nd, cotp(c1, c1, cfv(c2, c1))), w0)
  fveq2d(c2nd, cfv(c0, c1), cotp(c1, c1, cfv(c2, c1)), w0)
  idaval(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, w0)
  ax-mp(wceq(cfv(c2nd, cotp(c1, c1, cfv(c2, c1))), cfv(c2, c1)), wcel(cfv(c2, c1), universe))
  fvex(c2, c1)
  ot3rdg(cfv(c2, c1), universe, c1, c1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm ida2(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí(2nd `(c0 ` c1))=(c2 ` c1))
  ‚ä£ c0 =(IdA ` c3)
  ‚ä£ c4 =(Base ` c3)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c3 ‚àà Cat)
  ‚ä£ c2 =(Id ` c3)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c1 ‚àà c4)
} = {
  syl6eq((2nd `(c0 ` c1)), (c2 ` c1), (2nd ` < c1, c1,(c2 ` c1)>), w0)
  fveq2d(c2nd, (c0 ` c1), < c1, c1,(c2 ` c1)>, w0)
  idaval(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, w0)
  ax-mp((2nd ` < c1, c1,(c2 ` c1)>)=(c2 ` c1), (c2 ` c1)‚àà ùïå)
  fvex(c2, c1)
  ot3rdg((c2 ` c1), universe, c1, c1)
}

blocks.name: idahom
blocks.content: Domain and codomain of the identity arrow. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 11-Jan-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm idahom(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(cfv(c0, c1), co(c1, c2, c1)))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(cida, c3))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cbs, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, ccat))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c4))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(choma, c3))
} = {
  eqeltrd(cfv(c0, c1), co(c1, c2, c1), cotp(c1, c1, cfv(cfv(ccid, c3), c1)), w0)
  idaval(c0, c1, cfv(ccid, c3), c3, c4, w0)
  elhomai2(c1, c1, cfv(cfv(ccid, c3), c1), c2, c3, c4, cfv(chom, c3), w0)
  catidcl(cfv(ccid, c3), c1, cfv(chom, c3), c4, c3, w0)
  eqid(cfv(chom, c3))
  eqid(cfv(ccid, c3))
}

thm idahom(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí(c0 ` c1)‚àà(c1[c2]c1))
  ‚ä£ c0 =(IdA ` c3)
  ‚ä£ c4 =(Base ` c3)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c3 ‚àà Cat)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c1 ‚àà c4)
  ‚ä£ c2 =(HomA ` c3)
} = {
  eqeltrd((c0 ` c1), (c1[c2]c1), < c1, c1,((Id ` c3)` c1)>, w0)
  idaval(c0, c1, (Id ` c3), c3, c4, w0)
  elhomai2(c1, c1, ((Id ` c3)` c1), c2, c3, c4, (Hom ` c3), w0)
  catidcl((Id ` c3), c1, (Hom ` c3), c4, c3, w0)
  eqid((Hom ` c3))
  eqid((Id ` c3))
}

blocks.name: idaf
blocks.content: The identity arrow function is a function from objects to arrows. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 11-Jan-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm idaf(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wf(c0, c1, c2))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(cida, c3))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, ccat))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(carw, c3))
} = {
  fmpt2d(hs0, hs0, c0, c1, c2, cotp(cv(hs0), cv(hs0), cfv(cfv(ccid, c3), cv(hs0))), universe, w0)
  a1i(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1)), wcel(cotp(cv(hs0), cv(hs0), cfv(cfv(ccid, c3), cv(hs0))), universe))
  otex(cv(hs0), cv(hs0), cfv(cfv(ccid, c3), cv(hs0)))
  idafval(hs0, c0, c1, cfv(ccid, c3), c3, w0)
  eqid(cfv(ccid, c3))
  sseldi(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), c2, co(cv(hs0), cfv(choma, c3), cv(hs0)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1)))
  homarw(cv(hs0), cfv(choma, c3), cv(hs0), c2, c3)
  idahom(c0, cv(hs0), cfv(choma, c3), c3, c1, wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1)))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(c3, ccat))
  simpr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1))
  eqid(cfv(choma, c3))
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(ccid, c3))
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm idaf(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí(c0 : c1 ‚Üí c2))
  ‚ä£ c0 =(IdA ` c3)
  ‚ä£ c1 =(Base ` c3)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c3 ‚àà Cat)
  ‚ä£ c2 =(Arrow ` c3)
} = {
  fmpt2d(hs0, hs0, c0, c1, c2, < hs0, hs0,((Id ` c3)` hs0)>, universe, w0)
  a1i((w0 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà c1), < hs0, hs0,((Id ` c3)` hs0)> ‚àà ùïå)
  otex(hs0, hs0, ((Id ` c3)` hs0))
  idafval(hs0, c0, c1, (Id ` c3), c3, w0)
  eqid((Id ` c3))
  sseldi((c0 ` hs0), c2, (hs0[(HomA ` c3)]hs0), (w0 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà c1))
  homarw(hs0, (HomA ` c3), hs0, c2, c3)
  idahom(c0, hs0, (HomA ` c3), c3, c1, (w0 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà c1))
  adantr(w0, hs0 ‚àà c1, c3 ‚àà Cat)
  simpr(w0, hs0 ‚àà c1)
  eqid((HomA ` c3))
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)

  diff.hs0.c(c3)
}

thm coafval(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {

  -| wceq(c1, cfv(carw, c3))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cco, c3))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c3)
} = {
  a1ii(wceq(c0, cmpo(s0, s1, c1, crab(s2, c1, wceq(cfv(ccoda, cv(s2)), cfv(cdoma, cv(s0)))), cotp(cfv(cdoma, cv(s1)), cfv(ccoda, cv(s0)), co(cfv(c2nd, cv(s0)), co(cop(cfv(cdoma, cv(s1)), cfv(cdoma, cv(s0))), c2, cfv(ccoda, cv(s0))), cfv(c2nd, cv(s1)))))), diffsc(s2, c3))
  eqtri(c0, cmpo(s0, s1, c1, crab(s2, c1, wceq(cfv(ccoda, cv(s2)), cfv(cdoma, cv(s0)))), cotp(cfv(cdoma, cv(s1)), cfv(ccoda, cv(s0)), co(cfv(c2nd, cv(s0)), co(cop(cfv(cdoma, cv(s1)), cfv(cdoma, cv(s0))), c2, cfv(ccoda, cv(s0))), cfv(c2nd, cv(s1))))), cfv(ccoa, c3))

blocks.name: eldmcoa
blocks.content: A pair ` <. G , F >. ` is in the domain of the arrow composition, if the domain of ` G ` equals the codomain of ` F ` . (In this case we say ` G ` and ` F ` are composable.) (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 11-Jan-2017.)
